summary: Replaces snowy trees with their non-snow equivalent (with LOD) in such a way that if you use SFO then SFO's trees will be used with same effect.
descriptionHtml:
This was a little assignment for myself and i figured there might be somebody out there that could put this to use.

A little mod that changes all the snowy pines into non-snowy pines. I always found it a little jarring that two trees five feet away from each other could be covered with snow and the other entirely free of snow. I didnt just copy and rename meshes and texture's but changed what model to be drawn while keeping EditorID intact.

[u]SummerSets - Trees V1.0

[/u]Version one is for vanilla trees only. Ive included the billboards for those

Update V1.1 now includes fallen trees, stumps, logs, shrubs, and other flora that had a non-snowy version.

[u]SummerSets - Trees V2.0

[/u]Version two will be for Vurts Skyrim Flora Overhaul Summer Edition only. This version also includes the pines trees from Vurts 2.0f and has corresponding lods for them. They are my favorite pines to come out of the flora overhauls. The lods are not perfect but are made out of the available billboards for the trees used. On that note if theres a good texture artist out there that can work their magic on the lods that would be greatly appreciated.

[u]Compatibility[/u][u]

[/u] V1.1 - No issues unless you have a mod that changes tree lods. This version is for vanilla trees only.

V2.0 - This version is for Skyrim Flora Overhaul Summer Edition so install that first and then SummerSets - TreesV2.0. Ant mod you install after that changes tree lod's will cause weird tree Lods.

[center][u][b]Credits


Vurt[/b][/u] - For his great pines that i have used For V2.0
Skyrim Flora Overhaul - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?

[u][b]Acid Zebra[/b][/u] - For his great work on a spring overhaul which inspired me to make my own
Seasons of Skyrim - Springtime Overhaul - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27636/?

MY Other Mods
[/u]

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72023/? [/center]
